translations: n.反应动力学；动力学；运动学

sentences.sentence: Thermal Decomposition reaction kinetics of cerium carbonate was investigated with Netzsch thermal analyzer.
sentences.translation: 利用德国耐驰综合热分析仪对碳酸铈分解过程动力学进行了研究。

sentences.sentence: The apparent steady state kinetics of the aminoacylation reaction catalyzed by LeuRS at the participation of some RE 3+ was studied.
sentences.translation: 对部分稀土离子参与下 LeuRS 催化的的氨酰化反应表观稳态动力学性质进行了研究。

sentences.sentence: So now the kinetics are quite different.
sentences.translation: 现在动理学就完全不一样了。
